TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PartChromeState extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定控件及其周围的边框是处于正常状态还是最小化状态。

span.span: Specifies whether a control and the border surrounding it are in a normal or minimized state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举表示可能的 Web 部件控件和其周围的边框可以处于可见状态。The enumeration represents the possible visible states that a Web Parts control and its surrounding border can be in. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用使用自定义枚举ASP.NET 网页中引用的控件。The following code examples demonstrate the declarative use of the enumeration by using a custom control referenced in an ASP.NET Web page. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 该示例的第一个部分包含名为的自定义控件的代码`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of the example contains the code for the custom control, named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 因为控件派生自，它还继承的常见属性的类提供，包括属性，它使用作为其返回类型的枚举。Because the control derives from , it also inherits the common properties that the class provides, including the property, which uses the enumeration as its return type. [!code-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 请注意，在声明性标记的 web 页上，第二个实例`TextDisplayWebPart`控件将设置其属性。Note that in the declarative markup for the Web page, the second instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control sets its property. 加载浏览器中的页面后，第二个控件实例会显示最小化。After you load the page in a browser, the second control instance appears minimized. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState Minimized = int32(1)

summary.span: 处于折叠或最小化状态的控件和边框。

span.span: A control and border in a collapsed or minimized state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState Normal = int32(0)

summary.span: 处于正常状态的控件和边框。

span.span: A control and border in a normal state.
